Question
========

Every Saturday morning, Daan rolls a clean die. If he throws a 1 rolls then he goes swimming. If he rolls a 2, 3, 4, 5 or 6 then he goes he will ride his bike. What is the probability that out of the next five Saturdays he will do exactly three he will ride a bicycle?

Answerlist
----------

* 0,161
* 0,167
* 0,600
* 0,833

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.161: Correct
* 0.167: Incorrect
* 0.600: Incorrect
* 0.833: Incorrect
